author: hwright
msg: On the fs-rep-sharing branch:
Use the svn_checksum types and functions in a test.  This has the added benefit
of letting us parameterize the test based upon the kind of checksum we want
to use.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_fs/fs-test.c
(get_file_checksum): Renamed from get_file_digest().  Return a svn_checksum_t.
(file_itegrity_helper): Use svn_checksum funtions to build, store and compare
checksums on files.
[ Changes to subversion/libsvn_fs_base/reps-strings.c were accidentally included
in this commit, and reverted in r30952.]

author: kfogel
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/add.c
(svn_client__make_local_parents): Fix grammar in a comment, and
remove a part of the comment that was redundant with the code.
Follows up to r30945 and r30942.

author: pburba
msg: Fix issue #3188 Mergeinfo on switched targets/subtrees should elide to repos.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(do_directory_merge): Allow explicit mergeinfo on subtrees to elide to
the the repository.  Essentially treating them as if they were
separate merge targets.
* subversion/libsvn_client/mergeinfo.c
(svn_client__get_wc_mergeinfo): Fix a bug where if the WC_PATH passed to
this function was switched and we asked for only its inheritable mergeinfo
we still crawled up the working copy.  That's wrong, a switched path never
inherits mergeinfo from it's WC parent.
(svn_client__elide_mergeinfo): Stop quitting out early if ENTRY is
switched.  This prevented mergeinfo on switched merge targets from ever
eliding.
* subversion/libsvn_client/mergeinfo.h
(svn_client__get_wc_mergeinfo): Update doc string to correctly state how
inheritance doesn't occur over switched boundaries.
(svn_client__elide_mergeinfo): Tweak doc string to describe how switched
boundaries are handled.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(merge_to_switched_path): Tweak so issue #3188 is tested.
(merge_to_path_with_switched_children): Tweak so issue #3188 is tested.

author: glasser
msg: Merge from trunk to in-memory-branch, resolving a minor build.conf-lict.

author: kfogel
msg: Comment fixes only.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c: s/it's/its/ when possessive.
